__e: Well, can you tell me what's going on?
Vera, I know you're avoiding me and I don't want you hating me for the wrong reason.
I can't be sure, but I think you're avoiding me.

Now, if there's a man on this crew that feels differently, that feels as though he'd be willing to accept another brother suffering that fate so that he might avoid it, then that's a man I need to remove from my crew.
And you keep avoiding it because you assume we are responsible. Because he... he did it, Kate.
Hell, some people say God avoids this place altogether, but it's been a good home to us... to me and my kids, who I'm proud of, 'cause every single one of them reminds me a little bit of me.
Oh, really? Is that how you keep your death count so low? I'm sorry.
I don't drink 'cause I've had trouble with it before. I didn't mean to.
But if you only knew how many things I want to say and don't, you'd give me some credit.
"When things get too painful, we either avoid them or we laugh. "
- And how do we not get busted?
Mistakes are inevitable but we can improve; we must improve.
Are you sick? Or... are you trying to avoid me?
How do you not scare him?
I've been opening up to you all night, and you deflect any real question I ask you about yourself.
Well, are you avoiding actually seeing me?
I wonder, are you avoiding my question out of a reluctance to talk about yourself, or because you're genuinely confused?
If you leave now, there's a chance Frank might not kill you.
You say you want to connect with people... and then you spend two hours in the bathroom... avoiding the one person on this planet who wants to talk toyou.
- I'm not avoiding you as much as...
Well, nowt's getting past you, is it, today?
Oh, well, I'm not avoiding you because you were so romantic... ... I couldn't deal with it.
